Name: readShm Status
Pass Criteria: Ovld Level == 0; Process State == STATE_INS_ACTIVE; vnfHAMode == ACTIVE or HOT_STANDBY; LCM Event == StartSuccess; vnfState == ConfiguredActive; if node type == fe|asbcsip|asbcsre|asbcupc|vlb There should be Active/Standby Pair.

Name: Uptime Status
Pass Criteria: Config variable UPTIME_THRESHOLD_MIN >= system uptime min

Name: Warm Process Status
Command: ps -eo pid lstart cmd | grep -ai warm | grep 'IMS' | grep -v 'grep' | sed -e 's/\?/0/g';

Name: Log Level Config Status
Command: /bin/bash -c \"echo -e 'set screen length 0\nshow table sys platform LogConfig\nexit' | cli\";
Pass Criteria: LOG_CONFIG_LEVEL_DEBUG should not enabled. and cli command should be working

Name: Disk Space Status
Pass Criteria: Partition size must be less than config variable VOLUME_SIZE_THRESHOLH
